game.name: OneMore
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Steam Cloud, Steam Leaderboards, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Can you tell which definitions are fake and which aren't? OneMore combines traditional word-building games with rounds where you try to pick the one true definition out of four - three of them built by an AI.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Can you tell which definitions are fake and which aren't? OneMore combines traditional word-building games with rounds where you try to pick the one true definition out of four - three of them built by an AI.
